name: Kern, Appellant, v. Duquesne Brewing Company of Pittsburgh

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
parties: Kern, Appellant, v. Duquesne Brewing Company of Pittsburgh.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County in this case is affirmed on the excellent opinion by President Judge McNaugher, reported in 17 Pa. D. & C. 2d 299.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Paul J. Heenan, with him Mead J. Mulvihill, Jr., and James G. Larrimer, for corporate appellees.
George J. Schafer, with him Schafer and Schafer, for union, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kern, Appellant, v. Duquesne Brewing Company of Pittsburgh.
Argued May 28, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
James A. Ashton, for appellants.
Paul J. Heenan, with him Mead J. Mulvihill, Jr., and James G. Larrimer, for corporate appellees.
George J. Schafer, with him Schafer and Schafer, for union, appellee.
June 30, 1959:
